SEARCH
Package jdbcInterfaces

Interface DoctorManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
JDBCDoctor
public interface DoctorManager
Manages persistence and retrieval operations for the Doctor entity and related client assignments in the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addDoctor(Doctor doctor)
    Inserts a new doctor record into the database.
    List<Client>
    getClientsByDoctorId(int doctorId)
    Retrieves a list of all clients currently assigned to a specific doctor.
    int
    getDefaultDoctorId()
    Retrieves the doctor ID of the default doctor profile.
    Doctor
    getDoctorByUserId(int userId)
    Retrieves a doctor profile from the database using the associated user ID.
    List<Doctor>
    getDoctors()
    Retrieves a list of all doctor records from the database.
    void
    insertDoctorByDefault(Connection conn)
    Inserts a default doctor user into the database if one does not already exist.
    boolean
    isPatientAssignedToDoctor(int doctorId, int clientId)
    Checks if a specific client is currently assigned to a specific doctor.

  • Method Details

    • addDoctor

      void addDoctor(Doctor doctor)
      Inserts a new doctor record into the database.
      Parameters:
      doctor - The Doctor object to add. Its ID will be updated upon successful insertion.

    • getDoctorByUserId

      Doctor getDoctorByUserId(int userId)
      Retrieves a doctor profile from the database using the associated user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user linked to the doctor profile.
      Returns:
      The retrieved Doctor object, or null if no doctor is found for the given user ID.

    • getDoctors

      List<Doctor> getDoctors()
      Retrieves a list of all doctor records from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all Doctor objects found in the database.

    • getClientsByDoctorId

      List<Client> getClientsByDoctorId(int doctorId)
      Retrieves a list of all clients currently assigned to a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor whose clients are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of Client objects assigned to the doctor.

    • isPatientAssignedToDoctor

      boolean isPatientAssignedToDoctor(int doctorId, int clientId)
      Checks if a specific client is currently assigned to a specific doctor.
      Parameters:
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor to check assignment against.
      clientId - The ID of the client to verify.
      Returns:
      true if the client is assigned to the doctor, false otherwise.

    • insertDoctorByDefault

      void insertDoctorByDefault(Connection conn)
      Inserts a default doctor user into the database if one does not already exist.
      Parameters:
      conn - The active database connection used for insertion.

    • getDefaultDoctorId

      int getDefaultDoctorId()
      Retrieves the doctor ID of the default doctor profile.
      Returns:
      The ID of the default doctor, or -1 if the doctor is not found.
